title: Create more than one App Password session
body:
Request is to create more than one App Password session, ideally so sessions could be terminated while other sessions are left available.
Could also be a way to have different restrictions available to different users like:

"jojo" password supports 10mb maximum upload
"dougie" password supports 1gb maximum upload that keeps indefinitely.

Thanks either way for considering.
author: sunjam

comments.body: If we‚Äôre going this far, I think it might be better to have users and user groups with different permissions and restrictions. I‚Äôve thought about doing that, but I‚Äôm not sure if it aligns with the idea of the project, which is meant to be simple and quick: upload a file, copy the link, and send it to a friend or save it to your phone to download elsewhere later. And your idea about different password will probably be harder to implement

title: Request: disable "Keep Indefinitely" option
body:
Would be nice to not allow users to have to option to submit files indefinitely, since that puts pressure on the instance to keep their file on the server.

Thanks either way for considering.
author: sunjam

comments.body: I have already added that to my list for the next update, good suggestion.

title: Delete Indefinitely Files
body:
Hello,

is there a way to somehow delete these Files manually?
author: Schnurp

comments.body:
Hello,

In the latest version, there is an admin panel that allows you to delete those files. Additionally, I‚Äôve added a warning that non-password-protected files marked to "keep indefinitely" will only be deletable by an admin.

If you don‚Äôt want to update, you can manually delete the files from the file system and edit the database. Note that only deleting the files from the file system will result in them still appearing in the app, but an error will be thrown if someone tries to download them.
Very nice! Thank you very much!

title: Remove View Files link
body:
Hi there,

Wonderful project, Can I ask how to remove View Files from the front page, I just want to share the link of the file, and I don't want anyone browsing for uploaded files.

Thanks
author: WildMudd

comments.body: I will not be removing this feature, as I believe it is necessary. However, in the next update, I will be adding a checkbox option when uploading a file. This checkbox will allow users to hide the file from the "View Files" page if desired.
